name: Captain Crashy Wings
description:
Fly a very fragile airplane through different levels. Try to avoid obstacles, collect coins and try to reach the next base, so you can unlock new levels. 

New:
Captain Crashy Wings has now learned how to fly a helicopter.

Features:
★ Casual gameplay
★ Simple control (only one finger needed)
★ Physics-based game
★ Procedurally generated worlds
★ Different Music tracks
★ Retro 16-Bit graphics
★ Coins (Everybody loves coins)
★ Unlock new worlds
★ Fly, crash and repeat
